synopsis.p: Removes overlapping annotations from a given layer.

description.p: removes overlapping annotations in the layer .
, and specify the behavior for each situation. If the parameter is true, then will remove one of the annotations.
By default removes all kinds of annotations, keeping the longest one.

param-doc.name: documentFilter
param-doc.p: Only process document that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: sectionFilter
param-doc.p: Process only sections that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: layerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer to clear.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: This expression is evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as the context element, the module will process the document only if the result is true.

param-doc.name: annotationComparator
param-doc.p: Comparator to use in order to choose between overlapping annotations.

param-doc.name: removeEqual
param-doc.p: Either to remove annotations with equal spans.

param-doc.name: removeIncluded
param-doc.p: Either to remove annotations fully included in another annotation.

param-doc.name: removeOverlapping
param-doc.p: Either to remove strictly overlapping annotations.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
